settings.title: All matte. No glare.
settings.text:
A true matte display with a protective coating allows colours to shine while diffusing ambient light.

1920x1080 Full HD Resolution

400cd/m² of brightness

178° viewing angles and 180° hinge

settings.title: Glass Trackpad. Metal Chassis.
settings.text: An oversized trackpad with a legendary glass surface; dyed, toughened and treated with oleophobic coating. It also features a built-in fingerprint reader.

settings.title: Minuscule Charger. Massive Battery.
settings.text: 65-watt-hour lithium-polymer battery providing up to 14 hours battery life with a Gallium Nitride charger that is 30% smaller than traditional chargers, making it easy to take on the go.

settings.heading: Open-source firmware powered by coreboot and edk II

settings.text: Share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, make announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Measured Boot
settings.text: Secured boot flow gives you peace of mind.

settings.title: 5-years of updates
settings.text: Backed by secure updates delivered via the LVFS.

settings.title: Lightweight Firmware
settings.text: Super efficient firmware that only takes 0.76s to POST.

A true matte display with a protective coating allows colours to shine while diffusing ambient light.
